com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

Class FrameworkConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.framework.FrameworkConfig

  • public final class FrameworkConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates global Framework settings retrieved from the environment, or from a ServiceSpec in the case of a single-Service Framework. Presented as a non-static object to simplify scheduler tests, and to make it painfully obvious when global settings are being used in awkward places.

        Creates a FrameworkConfig instance based off the contents of the provided ServiceSpec.

      • fromEnvStore

        public static FrameworkConfig fromEnvStore(EnvStore envStore)
        Creates a FrameworkConfig instance based off the provided process environment. This is used when no single ServiceSpec is applicable (multi-service mode).

      • getFrameworkName

        public java.lang.String getFrameworkName()
        Returns the framework name to use with Mesos. When running a single service, this is equal to the service name.

        Returns the principal to use in resource reservations.

      • getNonNamespacedRole

        public java.lang.String getNonNamespacedRole()
        Returns the non-namespaced role used in earlier versions. Can be compared with getRole() to determine which role the current footprint has been deployed with.

      • getNamespacedRole

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getNamespacedRole()
        Returns the namespaced role derived from the framework name.
